description:
Saku and Yukichi receive invitations to Yume`s birthday party. Yukichi convinces Saku that it`ll be completely fine to attend since it`ll be a costume party. However, will Saku and Yukichi really be able to fool all the parents and children there?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Also Goes to Birthday Parties
Dekiru Neko wa Otanjoukai ni mo Iku
デキる猫はお誕生会にも行く
